list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Implement layered Java console app for cart-based checkout system
- Added Product model with shipping and expiration logic - Implemented Customer and Shippable interfaces - Created repository layer for managing product inventory - Built CartService for handling cart operations and calculating subtotal, shipping, and total - Developed CheckoutService to validate cart, deduct balances and inventory, and print receipts - Implemented ShippingService to generate shipment notices and total weight - Handled edge cases like expired products, out-of-stock items, and insufficient balance - Printed formatted receipt and shipping info as per requirements
